Method Detail

setSource

public static void setSource(java.awt.Component c,
                             java.lang.Object o)
You must use the DnDManager to register any Component you wish to be part of DnD operation (either as a drag source or a drop destination).

You must attach an Object which will be transferred to the target Component at the end of a drag-drop.

If the state of the Component changes in such a way that it's attached Object should change, setSource should be called again, and will attach the new Object.

setTarget

public static void setTarget(ComponentAcceptingDrop c)
Register a ComponentAcceptingDrop as a drop target.

setTarget

public static void setTarget(java.awt.Component c,
                             Code cd)
Register any Component as a drop target, providing some Code which will be executed at the end of the drag-drop.
